sentence.text: The human tongue cancer cell line CAL27 was used to study the effects of establishment of epithelial cell polarity.
The results showed establishment of epithelial cell polarity overexpression in tongue squamous cell carcinoma, and the positive reaction was predominately located in the cytoplasm.
The findings of the present study suggest that establishment of epithelial cell polarity expression correlates with the development of tongue squamous cell carcinoma.
